languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} makes an attack with their primary weapon. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target suffers weapon damage and, if it is affected by any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}, immediately suffers 4 additional instances of damage from those effects. This does not affect the duration of those effects.
languages.original_text: Палач совершает атаку текущим оружием (в первой руке) по цели, в случае попадания наносится урон оружием + 4 раза урон от ДоТ дополнительно, не снимая с противника доты. Дальность способности зависит от дальности экипированного оружия.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, every time a DoT deals damage to an enemy, it's final damage is increased by 100%. Stacks.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} makes an attack with a weapon in their primary hand. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target suffers weapon damage and, if it is affected by any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}, it immediately suffers 4 additional instances of damage from those effects. That does not affect the duration of the effects.

Until the end of combat, all damage dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. Multiple applications of this effect from two or more Executioners stack.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} makes an attack with their primary weapon. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target suffers weapon damage and, if it is affected by any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}, immediately suffers 4 additional instances of damage from those effects. This does not affect the duration of those effects.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} makes an attack with their primary weapon. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target suffers weapon damage and, if it is affected by any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}, immediately suffers 4 additional instances of damage from those effects. This does not affect the duration of those effects.

Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} realiza un ataque con su arma principal. Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g}, el objetivo sufre el daño del arma y, si está bajo algún {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} de daño continuado, sufre de inmediato 4 aplicaciones adicionales de ese daño. Esto no afecta a la duración de esos efectos.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} makes an attack with their primary weapon. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target suffers weapon damage and, if it is affected by any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}, immediately suffers 4 additional instances of damage from those effects. This does not affect the duration of those effects.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} realiza un ataque con su arma principal. Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g}, el objetivo sufre el daño del arma y, si está bajo algún {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} de daño continuado, sufre de inmediato 4 aplicaciones adicionales de ese daño. Esto no afecta a la duración de esos efectos.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}は主手の武器で攻撃を行う。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した場合、対象はダメージを受け、さらに継続ダメージの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受けている場合、それらの効果によるダメージを即座に4回追加で受ける。この処理は効果の持続時間には影響しない。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} makes an attack with a weapon in their primary hand. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target suffers weapon damage and, if it is affected by any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}, it immediately suffers 4 additional instances of damage from those effects. That does not affect the duration of the effects.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘が終了するまで、敵に継続ダメージで与えられるすべての{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が、他のすべての調整を受けた後、+100%増加する。この効果はスタックし、複数の{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}が与えることができる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}使用主手武器进行攻击。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，对目标造成武器伤害，如果目标受到持续伤害{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响，则立刻额外触发4次此效果的伤害。触发伤害不会影响持续伤害效果的持续时间。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} makes an attack with their primary weapon. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target suffers weapon damage and, if it is affected by any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}, immediately suffers 4 additional instances of damage from those effects. This does not affect the duration of those effects.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}使用主手武器进行攻击。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，对目标造成武器伤害，如果目标受到持续伤害{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响，则立刻额外触发4次此效果的伤害。触发伤害不会影响持续伤害效果的持续时间。

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} greift mit seiner Primärwaffe an. Im Falle eines {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffers{/g} erleidet das Ziel Waffenschaden. Ist es mit Schaden-über-Zeit-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekten{/g} belegt, erleidet es sofort 4 weitere Instanzen Schaden durch diese Effekte. Dies wirkt sich nicht auf die Dauer dieser Effekte aus.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} makes an attack with their primary weapon. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target suffers weapon damage and, if it is affected by any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}, immediately suffers 4 additional instances of damage from those effects. This does not affect the duration of those effects.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} greift mit seiner Primärwaffe an. Im Falle eines {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffers{/g} erleidet das Ziel Waffenschaden. Ist es mit Schaden-über-Zeit-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekten{/g} belegt, erleidet es sofort 4 weitere Instanzen Schaden durch diese Effekte. Dies wirkt sich nicht auf die Dauer dieser Effekte aus.

languages.text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} attaque avec son arme principale. La cible {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g} subit des dégâts d'arme et, si elle est affectée par des {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effets{/g} de dégâts progressifs, elle subit 4 instances supplémentaires de dégâts de ces effets. La durée de ces effets n'est pas affectée.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} makes an attack with their primary weapon. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target suffers weapon damage and, if it is affected by any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}, immediately suffers 4 additional instances of damage from those effects. This does not affect the duration of those effects.

traits.locale_text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} attaque avec son arme principale. La cible {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g} subit des dégâts d'arme et, si elle est affectée par des {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effets{/g} de dégâts progressifs, elle subit 4 instances supplémentaires de dégâts de ces effets. La durée de ces effets n'est pas affectée.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Палач{/g} совершает атаку оружием в ведущей руке. При {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} цель получает урон от оружия; кроме того, если цель находится под воздействием {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффектов{/g} периодического урона, она получает внеочередной урон от этих эффектов 4 раза. Длительность наложенных эффектов при этом не меняется.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} makes an attack with a weapon in their primary hand. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target suffers weapon damage and, if it is affected by any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}, it immediately suffers 4 additional instances of damage from those effects. That does not affect the duration of the effects.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Палач{/g} совершает атаку оружием ведущей рукой. При {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} цель получает урон от оружия; кроме того, если цель находится под воздействием {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффектов{/g} периодического урона, она получает внеочередной урон от этих эффектов 4 раза. Длительность примененных эффектов при этом не меняется.

До конца боя весь наносимый противникам периодический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на 100% после применения других модификаторов. Этот эффект суммируется и может быть применен несколькими {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачами{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Палач{/g} совершает атаку оружием ведущей рукой. При {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} цель получает урон от оружия; кроме того, если цель находится под воздействием {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффектов{/g} периодического урона, она получает внеочередной урон от этих эффектов 4 раза. Длительность примененных эффектов при этом не меняется.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Палач{/g} совершает атаку оружием в ведущей руке. При {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} цель получает урон от оружия; кроме того, если цель находится под воздействием {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффектов{/g} периодического урона, она получает внеочередной урон от этих эффектов 4 раза. Длительность наложенных эффектов при этом не меняется.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g}, ana silahıyla bir saldırı yapar. Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} hâlinde silah hasarı alır ve herhangi bir zamanla hasar veren {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkinin{/g} tesirindeyse anında aynı etkiden 4 ilave hasar silsilesine maruz kalır. Bu durum, etkilerin süresinde değişiklik yaratmaz.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} makes an attack with their primary weapon. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the target suffers weapon damage and, if it is affected by any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g}, immediately suffers 4 additional instances of damage from those effects. This does not affect the duration of those effects.

Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} hâlinde silah hasarı alır ve herhangi bir zamanla hasar veren {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkinin{/g} tesirindeyse anında aynı etkiden 4 ilave hasar silsilesine maruz kalır. Bu durum, etkilerin süresinde değişiklik yaratmaz.
